synopsis.text:
Magic and adventure collide in this enchanting anime! The magical world is abuzz with excitement as the once-in-a-century Wishing Stone Festival approaches, a celebration where the mystical Wishing Stone grants a single wish to one chosen individual. Mirai and her friends, including her beloved talking plush bear Mofurun, join the festivities, eager to witness the spectacle. However, when Mofurun is selected by the Stone, an unexpected twist unfolds.

A mysterious bear wizard, Dark Matter, disrupts the celebration, kidnapping both Mofurun and the Wishing Stone. Dark Matter's sinister plan is to coerce Mofurun into wishing for the eradication of all magicians. Mirai, Riko, and their companion Haa are left in disarray, their magical transformation abilities lost due to Mofurun's abduction.

Embarking on a daring rescue mission, Mirai and her friends must navigate the challenges of the magical world, overcome Dark Matter's evil scheme, and save Mofurun. Will they succeed in time to prevent the erasure of all magicians? Join Mirai and her friends on this thrilling journey to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
